channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A South African horror story: illegal mining stand-off draws to an end

item.title: Has Trump promised too much on US economy?
item.description: He won the election to fix inflation but Trump may find his pledges on prices and tariffs can't both win out, say experts.

item.title: TikTok says it will 'go dark' on Sunday without US government action
item.description: The Supreme Court earlier upheld a law that would ban the video app in the US unless its Chinese parent-company sells it.

item.title: Washington man rescued after going missing on Oregon's Mount Hood
